description: Help your little one feel part of the superhero action and enjoy a sense of accomplishment as they piece together our “Batman” giant floor puzzle! Holy playtime! Give your child some calming, screen-free fun, and the satisfaction of learning important skills, with our “Batman” giant floor puzzle! Our 60-piece puzzle features kid-friendly illustrations of Batgirl, Batman and his trusty sidekick, Robin ready to keep Gotham City safe from the Joker’s pranks. Puzzles help develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills and problem-solving through repeated practice while delivering hours of relaxing fun! Spark children’s imaginations while they develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills and problem-solving through repeated practice! Our 60-piece floor puzzle has giant, durable pieces little hands can easily hold on to for lots of repeat fun. Clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s tight interlocking fit provide a pleasurable puzzling experience for children and their adult helpers alike. With piece counts children can grow with, our Perfect Age Fit criteria ensure this puzzle is fun and educational for ages 4 and up!
